snippet.title: Pikmin Bloom Announcement
snippet.description:
Niantic and Nintendo launch Pikmin Bloom, an app that brings a little joy to your everyday journeys on foot. Walk to grow more Pikmin, walk to make flowers bloom, and walk to log your memories.

Download Pikmin Bloom here:
★iOS⇒ https://apple.co/3bgDGgC
☆Android⇒ https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.nianticlabs.pikmin  

Copyright (C) 2021 Niantic, Inc., Pikmin and Mii Characters / Artwork / Music Copyright (C) 2021 Nintendo. All Rights Reserved.
